meanings.sent1: The beautiful sunset was a seen sight.
meanings.sent2: The seen stars twinkled in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The seen rainbow made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The seen flowers bloomed like a colorful painting.
meanings.sent5: The seen mountain stood majestic and grand.

meanings.sent1: I have seen the movie three times.
meanings.sent2: She seen the accident happen right in front of her.
meanings.sent3: The cat seen the mouse and pounced playfully.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work can be seen in every project.
meanings.sent5: The impact of her words seen in the tears in his eyes.
